import requests

url = "https://phonevalication.p.rapidapi.com/clientprojects.bwm.in/admin/phone_verify"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "phonevalication.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
